runs.notification_invite_subject: You have been sent a survey to complete
runs.notification_reminder_body:

children.label: b68128118
children.text:
IMPORTANT: Please complete this survey on your computer (not on your phone).

Thank you for agreeing to participate in Round 2 of the ENLIGHT survey.

In Round 1, we asked you to rate the importance of a series of potential items for reporting light interventions. We have used this information to construct a draft checklist, which we have shared with you via email.

In this round, Round 2, you will be asked to indicate which format you recommend for a given item (text, table, or figure). Please note that in this round, we are mostly asking you for information that we will include in the recommendation document that accompanies the checklist.

Please make sure that you have the checklist open on your computer or available for reference as a print-out while you are completing this survey.

If you have any comments or feedback you would like to give throughout the survey, there will be an open comment field at the end of the survey.

We look forward to receiving your input.

 

Any other comments?

If you have any questions throughout the survey, please feel free to reach out to any member of the ENLIGHT team, or our general email address at enlight@lightcat.group.

children.label: b68136318
children.text: Please enter your unique 5-character ID.

children.label: b68125780
children.text:
The following items were rated by >75% of respondents to be important or very important in Round 1. We consider these to be essential.

In this section, we are asking you to indicate whether these items should be reported as text, table or figure. For some items, some options do not apply. In these cases, please ignore those options. Please note that you can select more than one format for each item.

children.label: b68122729
children.text: Please indicate how the following essential items should be reported. The headings (e.g. A.1, B.2, etc.) refer to the checklist sections.

children.label: b68167190
children.text: A.1. Timeline of experiment (including timing and duration of light)

children.label: b68167192
children.text: A.1. Pre-laboratory light exposure

children.label: b68167194
children.text: A.1. Pre-laboratory sleep-wake behaviour

children.label: b68167196
children.text: A.1. Immediate prior light exposure

children.label: b68167198
children.text: A.1. Description of experimental setting

children.label: b68167200
children.text: A.2. Measurement plane (e.g., horizontal or vertical)

children.label: b68167202
children.text: A.2. Measurement viewpoint and location

children.label: b68167204
children.text: A.2. Make & manufacturer of the measurement instrument

children.label: b68167206
children.text: A.2. Calibration status of the instrument

children.label: b68167208
children.text: B.1. Type, make and manufacturer of the light source

children.label: b68167210
children.text: B.2. Spectral irradiance distribution

children.label: b68167212
children.text: B.2. Illuminance (lux)

children.label: b68167214
children.text: B.2. a−opic irradiance (including melanopic)

children.label: b68167216
children.text: B.4. Temporal pattern (including flicker frequency and waveform)

children.label: b68167218
children.text: B.4. Location of stimulus and viewing distance

children.label: b68167220
children.text: B.4. Relative size of the stimulus

children.label: b68126395
children.text:
Some of the following items were rated as important or very important by <75% of respondents rating. As a consequence, these did not reach the threshold for automatic inclusion but were added for completeness across reporting categoriess and technical accuracy. Other items were newly added based on free-form feedback from participants.

In this section, we are asking you to indicate whether these items should be reported as text, table or figure. For some items, some options do not apply. In these cases, please ignore those options. Please note that you can select more than one format for each item.

If you do not think that these items should be included in the checklist, please indicate this. If you do not know or recognise the quantity, please indicate this as well.

IMPORTANT: If you indicate that the items should not be included in the checklist, please indicate nonetheless which format they should be reported in.

children.label: b68123256
children.text: The following items did not reach the threshold for inclusion in Round 1, but have been included in the draft for completeness and technical accuracy. Please select how (and if) the following items should be reported.

children.label: b68167228
children.text: B.2. Spectral radiance distribution

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68167231
children.text: B.2. Luminance (cd/m2)

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68167234
children.text: B.2. a−opic radiance (including melanopic)

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68167237
children.text: B.2. a−opic equivalent daylight illuminance (EDI, including melanopic)

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68167240
children.text: B.2. a−opic equivalent daylight luminance (EDL, including melanopic)

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68165402
children.text: The following items were newly added to the checklist based on open-text suggestions in Round 1. Please select how (and if) the following items should be reported.

children.label: b68167330
children.text: A.3. Pupil dilation

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

options.text: Don't know or recognise this quantity/item

children.label: b68128791
children.text:
Based on your input in Round 1 of this survey, the following items were not added to the checklist as items in their own right. Nevertheless, some items might still be reported and referred to in other categories. For example, CCT might still be included in the "B.3. Colour characteristics" but does not warrant its own row in the checklist.

Please indicate whether the items below should have been included as their own items.

Please note that this only concerns the checklist, not whether these items should be measured.

IMPORTANT: If you do not think that any of these items should be included as their own row in the checklist, you can skip this section.

children.label: b68136212
children.text: CIE S026 quantities: a-opic efficacy of luminous radiation (a-opic ELR)

children.label: b68136214
children.text: CIE S026 quantities: a-opic daylight (D65) efficacy ratio (a-opic DER)

children.label: b68136216
children.text: Colour quantities: CIE 1931 XYZ (tristimulus coordinates)

children.label: b68136218
children.text: Colour quantities: Duv

children.label: b68136220
children.text: Colour quantities: CIE 1976 u'v'

children.label: b68136222
children.text: Colour quantities: CIE 1964 XYZ (tristimulus coordinates)

children.label: b68136224
children.text: Colour quantities: CIE 1931 xy (chromaticity)

children.label: b68136226
children.text: Colour quantities: CIE 1964 xy (chromaticity)

children.label: b68136228
children.text: Colour quantities: Correlated colour temperature (CCT)

children.label: b68136230
children.text: Colour rendition metrics: Rg (Colour Gamut Score; IES TM-30-15, CIE 224:2017)

children.label: b68136232
children.text: Colour rendition metrics: Rf (Colour Fidelity Index; IES TM-30-15, CIE 224:2017)

children.label: b68136234
children.text: Colour rendition metrics: Ra (Colour Rendering Index = CRI; CIE 13.3:1995)

children.label: b68136236
children.text: Experimental setting-level: Photograph of experimental setting

children.label: b68136238
children.text: Experimental setting-level: Drawing of experimental setting

children.label: b68136240
children.text: Experimental setting-level: Room geometry (including size)

children.label: b68136242
children.text: Instrument-level characteristics: Serial number

children.label: b68136244
children.text: Instrument-level characteristics: Calibration year

children.label: b68136246
children.text: Photometric quantities: Retinal illuminance (in Trolands)

children.label: b68136248
children.text: Source-level characteristics: Manufacturer-supplied characteristics (CCT, spectrum, ...)

children.label: b68136250
children.text: Spatial characteristics: Natural-language descriptors of spatial configuration

children.label: b68136252
children.text: Spatial characteristics: Absolute size of stimulus (e.g. in mm)

children.label: b68136254
children.text: Spectral characteristics: Spectral power distribution (arbitrary units)

children.label: b68136256
children.text: Spectral characteristics: Spectral power distribution (normalised)

children.label: b68127787
children.text: Do you have any comments or feedback on the current checklist, either regarding content or format?

children.label: b68128078
children.text: IMPORTANT: Please continue the survey until you see a message saying "You may now close this browser window."

children.label: b68128115
children.text:
Thank you for participating in Round 2 of the ENLIGHT study.

You may now close this browser window.
